Message:
...Huh, I’m alive...? How...?
That poison should’ve been fatal...

When I awoke,
I saw a mysterious fog and
people in deep slumber.
There was also
a man with a staff.

Apparently, he’s some kind of
“savior” from a distant world,
traversing different worlds
to dispel Curses.

And, he was the one
who saved me.

If he hadn’t found my body
lying on the ground, I would’ve...

He says this fog is the work
of a witch whose heart fell
into the clutches of a demon,

and saving that witch’s heart is
the key to dispelling the Curse...

But, something dawned on me.
The moment I touched the fog,
I heard something.
...I long to see thee again, Asahi.

That was the Princess’s voice.
Thus, I must go to her.
Such is my duty as her shadow!
